Description: The following statement contains a magic number: var query =                  from t in session.Query<RoadSegment>()                  where t.Fid == 102                  select ((LineString)t.Centerline)                  .GetPointN(1);

The following statement contains a magic number: var query =                  from t in session.Query<DividedRoute>()                  where t.Name == "Route 75"                  select t.Centerlines.GetGeometryN(2);
